messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Fw: [Native-Amer-Medicine] Pneumococcal Vaccine Peti...
messages.msgSnippet: This is not the first time the government in the gise of the BIA and their IHS have used Native Americans to test vaccines on.  The last two they tested (Hep A
messages.messageBody:
This is not the first time the government in the gise of the BIA and their
IHS have used Native Americans to test vaccines on. The last two they
tested (Hep A & B) were not terribly successful (neurological problems are
being reported up to 10 years after the vaccine) but they still approved
the vaccines! Also, the testing showed there was no way to predict how
long the Hep B vaccine would last! Also, in the 70's (1970's, not 1870's)
the BIA, again using IHS, performed sterilization procedures on thousands
of NA women without their permission or knowledge. No, this is nothing new
for the NA population!

Lynda

----------
> From: Tamilooch@...
> To: Unschooling-dotcom@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Fw: [Native-Amer-Medicine] Pneumococcal
Vaccine Peti...
> Date: Saturday, March 18, 2000 12:17 AM
>
> From: Tamilooch@...
>
> Little Otter,
> Im not Native American but I think that is terrible!!! I will send your
> message out to all of my friends. Good Luck.
>
> Tamie.

messages.messageBody:
Little Otter,
I will definitely sign your petition! I am outraged at the
very thought of testing on children! Keep strong and know that there are many
who support you and pray with you.
Best wishes, jackie
